SubjectRegulations Amending the Concentration of Phosphorus in Certain Cleaning Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONCENTRATION OF PHOSPHORUS IN CERTAIN CLEANING PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to ensure consistency with Canadaâ€™s international obligations under the Trade Facilitation Agreement and also aim to provide consistency and standardization of the laboratory accreditation provisions with other regulations under Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999.
